original_text: And they shall keep all the instruments of the tabernacle of the congregation, and the charge of the children of Israel, to do the service of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 곧 회막의 모든 기구를 맡아 지키며 이스라엘 자손의 직무를 위하여 성막에서 시무할지니

sentences.original_text: And they shall keep all the instruments
of the tabernacle of the congregation,
and the charge of the children of Israel,
to do the service of the tabernacle.
